sql-select.name: GetDatabasesCount
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS [NumberOfDatabases]
,SUM( CASE WHEN tSD.[name] IN ( N'master' ,N'model' ,N'msdb' ,N'tempdb' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS [NumberOfSystemDatabases]
,SUM( CASE WHEN (CONVERT([NVARCHAR](128), DatabasePropertyEx(tSD.[name], N'Updateability')) = N'READ_ONLY') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS [NumberOfReadOnlyDatabases]
,SUM( CASE WHEN (CONVERT([INTEGER], DatabasePropertyEx(tSD.[name], N'IsInStandBy')) = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS [NumberOfStandbyDatabases]
,SUM( CASE WHEN (CONVERT([NVARCHAR](128), DatabasePropertyEx(tSD.[name], N'Status')) = N'RESTORING') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS [NumberOfRecoveryDatabases]
,SUM( CASE WHEN (CONVERT([NVARCHAR](128), DatabasePropertyEx(tSD.[name], N'Status')) = N'OFFLINE') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS [NumberOfflineDatabases] FROM [master].[dbo].[sysdatabases] tSD;
